languages.text: Пройдя к центру спирали опавших сервиторских тел, Главный технопровидец мрачно нависал над ними, вглядываясь в мертвые лица. "Этот технофеномен заслуживал досконального изучения. Дальнейшее исследование невозможно", — изрек он. Вероятно, то были игры моего воображения, но тогда в его взгляде мне померещилось некое подобие печали.

traits.locale_text: Пройдя к центру спирали опавших сервиторских тел, Старший Технопровидец мрачно нависал над ними, вглядываясь в мертвые лица. "Этот технофеномен заслуживал досконального изучения. Дальнейшее исследование невозможно", — изрек он. Вероятно, то были игры моего воображения, но тогда в его взгляде мне померещилось некое подобие печали.

languages.text: The Enginseer Prime proceeded to the centre of the spiral of servitor bodies, stood over them grimly, studying their lifeless faces, and spoke thus: "This tech-phenomenon warranted comprehensive study. Further investigation has been rendered impossible." Perhaps it was a trick of my imagination, but I thought I caught a semblance of sorrow in his gaze in that moment.
languages.original_text: Пройдя к центру спирали опавших сервиторских тел, Главный технопровидец мрачно нависал над ними, вглядываясь в мертвые лица. "Этот технофеномен заслуживал досконального изучения. Дальнейшее исследование невозможно", — изрек он. Вероятно, то были игры моего воображения, но тогда в его взгляде мне померещилось некое подобие печали.

traits.locale_text: The Chief Enginseer proceeded to the centre of the spiral of servitor bodies, stood over them grimly, studying their lifeless faces, and spoke thus: "This tech-phenomenon deserved comprehensive study. Further investigation has been rendered impossible." Perhaps it was a trick of my imagination, but I thought I caught a semblance of sorrow in his gaze in that moment.

The Chief Enginseer proceeded to the centre of the spiral of servitor bodies, stood over them grimly, studying their lifeless faces, and spoke thus: "This tech-phenomenon deserved comprehensive study. Further investigation has been rendered impossible." Perhaps it was a trick of my imagination, but I thought I caught a semblance of sorrow in his gaze in that moment.

The Enginseer Prime proceeded to the centre of the spiral of servitor bodies, stood over them grimly, studying their lifeless faces, and spoke thus: "This tech-phenomenon warranted comprehensive study. Further investigation has been rendered impossible." Perhaps it was a trick of my imagination, but I thought I caught a semblance of sorrow in his gaze in that moment.

The Enginseer Prime proceeded to the centre of the spiral of servitor bodies, stood over them grimly, studying their lifeless faces, and spoke thus: "This tech-phenomenon warranted comprehensive study. Further investigation has been rendered impossible." Perhaps it was a trick of my imagination, but I thought I caught a semblance of sorrow in his gaze in that moment.

The Enginseer Prime proceeded to the centre of the spiral of servitor bodies, stood over them grimly, studying their lifeless faces, and spoke thus: "This tech-phenomenon warranted comprehensive study. Further investigation has been rendered impossible." Perhaps it was a trick of my imagination, but I thought I caught a semblance of sorrow in his gaze in that moment.

languages.text: 機関整備師主任は、サーヴィターの体の螺旋の中心に進み、陰気な表情でその生命のない顔を熟考しながら次のように述べた。「この技術現象は包括的な研究を正当化するものだった。さらなる調査は不可能となった。」おそらく私の想像かもしれないが、その瞬間、彼の視線に悲しみのようなものを感じたように思えた。
languages.original_text: The Enginseer Prime proceeded to the centre of the spiral of servitor bodies, stood over them grimly, studying their lifeless faces, and spoke thus: "This tech-phenomenon warranted comprehensive study. Further investigation has been rendered impossible." Perhaps it was a trick of my imagination, but I thought I caught a semblance of sorrow in his gaze in that moment.

traits.locale_text: 機関整備師主任は、サーヴィターの体の螺旋の中心に進み、陰気な表情でその生命のない顔を熟考しながら次のように述べた。「この技術現象は包括的な研究を正当化するものだった。さらなる調査は不可能となった。」おそらく私の想像かもしれないが、その瞬間、彼の視線に悲しみのようなものを感じたように思えた。

languages.text: Le technaugure primus se rendit au centre de la spirale que formaient les servitors et examina leurs visages sans vie avec un air sévère, puis s'exprima en ces termes : « Ce technophénomène nécessitait une étude approfondie. Tout complément d'examen est désormais impossible. » Peut-être était-ce mon imagination, mais je crus alors discerner dans son regard un soupçon de chagrin.
languages.original_text: The Enginseer Prime proceeded to the centre of the spiral of servitor bodies, stood over them grimly, studying their lifeless faces, and spoke thus: "This tech-phenomenon warranted comprehensive study. Further investigation has been rendered impossible." Perhaps it was a trick of my imagination, but I thought I caught a semblance of sorrow in his gaze in that moment.

traits.locale_text: Le technaugure primus se rendit au centre de la spirale que formaient les servitors et examina leurs visages sans vie avec un air sévère, puis s'exprima en ces termes : « Ce technophénomène nécessitait une étude approfondie. Tout complément d'examen est désormais impossible. » Peut-être était-ce mon imagination, mais je crus alors discerner dans son regard un soupçon de chagrin.

languages.text: 尊敬的贤者走到螺旋形队伍的中心，面无表情地站在那些机仆面前，研究着它们毫无生机的面孔，随后开了口。“这样的技术现象本来值得全面研究，但进一步的研究已经无法实现了。”不知道是不是我想多了，但那一刻，我总感觉在他的目光中看到了一丝哀伤的意味。
languages.original_text: The Enginseer Prime proceeded to the centre of the spiral of servitor bodies, stood over them grimly, studying their lifeless faces, and spoke thus: "This tech-phenomenon warranted comprehensive study. Further investigation has been rendered impossible." Perhaps it was a trick of my imagination, but I thought I caught a semblance of sorrow in his gaze in that moment.

traits.locale_text: 尊敬的贤者走到螺旋形队伍的中心，面无表情地站在那些奴工面前，研究着它们毫无生机的面孔，随后开了口。“这样的技术现象本来值得全面研究，但进一步的研究已经无法实现了。”不知道是不是我想多了，但那一刻，我总感觉在他的目光中看到了一丝哀伤的意味。

languages.text: El visioingeniero primero avanzó hasta el centro de la espiral de cuerpos de servidores, examinó con expresión adusta sus rostros sin vida y declaró: «Este fenómeno tecnológico requería un estudio exhaustivo. Ahora es imposible continuar con la investigación». Tal vez fuera mi imaginación, pero, en ese momento, me pareció ver un atisbo de pena en su mirada.
languages.original_text: The Enginseer Prime proceeded to the centre of the spiral of servitor bodies, stood over them grimly, studying their lifeless faces, and spoke thus: "This tech-phenomenon warranted comprehensive study. Further investigation has been rendered impossible." Perhaps it was a trick of my imagination, but I thought I caught a semblance of sorrow in his gaze in that moment.

traits.locale_text: El visioingeniero primero avanzó hasta el centro de la espiral de cuerpos de servidores, examinó con expresión adusta sus rostros sin vida y declaró: «Este fenómeno tecnológico requería un estudio exhaustivo. Ahora es imposible continuar con la investigación». Tal vez fuera mi imaginación, pero, en ese momento, me pareció ver un atisbo de pena en su mirada.

languages.text: Der Maschinenseher Primus schritt in das Zentrum der Spirale aus Servitoren-Leichen. Er stand mit düsterer Miene über ihnen, studierte ihre leblosen Gesichter und sagte: "Dieses Tech-Phänomen hätte umfangreich studiert werden müssen. Nun ist eine weitere Untersuchung unmöglich." Vielleicht war es Einbildung, doch ich glaubte, in seinem Blick einen Anflug von Trauer zu erkennen.
languages.original_text: The Enginseer Prime proceeded to the centre of the spiral of servitor bodies, stood over them grimly, studying their lifeless faces, and spoke thus: "This tech-phenomenon warranted comprehensive study. Further investigation has been rendered impossible." Perhaps it was a trick of my imagination, but I thought I caught a semblance of sorrow in his gaze in that moment.

traits.locale_text: Der Maschinenseher Primus schritt in das Zentrum der Spirale aus Servitoren-Leichen. Er stand mit düsterer Miene über ihnen, studierte ihre leblosen Gesichter und sagte: "Dieses Tech-Phänomen hätte umfangreich studiert werden müssen. Nun ist eine weitere Untersuchung unmöglich." Vielleicht war es Einbildung, doch ich glaubte, in seinem Blick einen Anflug von Trauer zu erkennen.

languages.text: Başmühedyum; hizmetör bedenlerinin oluşturduğu sarmalın merkezine doğru yürüdü, başlarına dikildi ve cansız suratlarını inceledi. Ardından konuşmaya başladı: "Bu tekno olgunun etraflıca araştırılması gerekiyordu. Soruşturmanın devam etmesi artık mümkün değil." Hayalimin bir ürünü değilse o lahzada gözlerinde bir nebze hüzün gördüm.
languages.original_text: The Enginseer Prime proceeded to the centre of the spiral of servitor bodies, stood over them grimly, studying their lifeless faces, and spoke thus: "This tech-phenomenon warranted comprehensive study. Further investigation has been rendered impossible." Perhaps it was a trick of my imagination, but I thought I caught a semblance of sorrow in his gaze in that moment.

traits.locale_text: Başmühedyum hizmetör bedenlerinin oluşturduğu sarmalın merkezine doğru yürüdü, başlarına dikildi ve cansız suratlarını inceledi. Ardından konuşmaya başladı: "Bu tekno olgunun etraflıca araştırılması gerekiyordu. Soruşturmanın devam etmesi artık mümkün değil." Hayalimin bir ürünü değilse o lahzada gözlerinde bir nebze hüzün gördüm.
